news.title: Pressure mounts on American Airlines CEO as carrier lags rivals
news.summary: American Airlines made $111 million last year. Delta Air Lines and United Airlines, brought in $5 billion and $3.3 billion, respectively.

news.title: Automakers largely sit out 2026 Super Bowl advertising amid industry uncertainty
news.summary: Automakers are largely sitting on the advertising sidelines during this year's Super Bowl. The Super Bowl comes amid broader uncertainty in the U.S. automotive industry.

news.title: Tech AI spending may approach $700 billion this year, but the blow to cash raises red flags
news.summary: Tech's megacaps announced major increases in capex spend for 2026. Now investors are preparing for cash to dwindle. Tech's mega-tech companies are planning for a cash-strapped future.

news.title: Elon Musk wants to be a trillionaire — here's how SpaceX may get him there
news.summary: Elon Musk's net worth soared past $800 billion this week. He merged SpaceX with xAI in a deal that valued the combined entity at $1.25 trillion.

news.title: Trump condemns racist video showing Obamas as apes after removing it, but says he won't apologize
news.summary: The depiction of the Obamas was posted from Trump's Truth Social account. It was included in a video pushing a conspiracy theory about 2020 election voting machines.

news.title: ‘It’s existential’: How Big Tech found itself in a $650 billion spending spiral
news.summary: The market has spoken: It doesn't like the massive AI spending spree of the "Big Four" hyperscalers. But the companies are barreling ahead anyway.

news.title: Gen Z is obsessed with 2016, and beauty stocks like e.l.f. and Ulta are riding the nostalgia wave
news.summary: A social-media trend celebrating all things 2016 could usher in a makeup boom. The trend is called "Makeup Tuesday" The trend was created to celebrate the end of the year.

news.title: This Super Bowl snack can help slim your waist — and spare your wallet
news.summary: The New England Patriots are set to play in the Super Bowl on Sunday. The game is expected to be played in New England's home town of Gillette.

news.title: Bitcoin’s 50% plunge from highs ‘hurts a little’ — but it isn’t shaking these investors’ conviction
news.summary: “Volatility is the price of admission with bitcoin,” one investor says. “Volatile is thePrice of Admission with bitcoin.”

news.title: I settled my father’s estate, but found a will deeding a mobile home to his stepson. Am I ethically and legally obliged to fix this?
news.summary: “I understand that I must initiate probate in his state of residence,” she said. “I must initiate Probate in the state of his residence.”
